name: DR-1P DR-0P
description:
Help a little robot make pairs of raindrops and snowflakes, but be careful not to get your circuits too wet!

As rain and snow falls down toward you, launch arrows to push the precipitation around the playing field!  Guide matching pairs together for points, but be careful; combining a raindrop and a snowflake will release steam into the air, making the precipitation come even faster!  Make sure not to let any of the rain or snow damage your vulnerable robot body, and make as many matches as you can.

Get the highest score you can in this challenging, matching, shoot-em-up arcade-style game!
